resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/82575</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82575</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>15546</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Europei famosi</string>
            <string language="en">Famous European People</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Berühmte Europäische Leute</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les  Européens Célèbres</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Povos Europeus Famosos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάσημοι ευρωπαϊκοί άνθρωποι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Gente Europea Famosa</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">A progetto a lungo termine basato sulla ricerca guidata; Si segue una strategia formativa del tipo "jigsaw".</string>
            <string language="en">A long term project based on a webquest built into a jigsaw pattern.</string>
          </description>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein langes Bezeichnung Projekt basiert auf einem 
webquest aufgebaut in ein zackiges Muster.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un projet à long terme basé sur un webquest 
construit dans une configuration denteuse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um projeto a longo prazo baseado em um o mais 
webquest construído em um teste padrão jigsaw.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα μακροπρόθεσμο πρόγραμμα βασισμένο σε έναν pjo'
ωεψquεστ που χτίζεται σε ένα πρότυπο τορνευτικών πριονιών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un proyecto a largo plazo basado en un la ma's 
webquest construida en un modelo del rompecabezas.</string>
          </description>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:Buijten;Corinne;;;
FN:Corinne Buijten
ORG:null
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>15546</entry>
          </identifier>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>creator</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:Buijten Salles;Corinne;;;
FN:Corinne Buijten Salles
ORG:
END:VCARD</entity>
            <date>

            </date>
          </contribute>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:;European Schoolnet
FN:European Schoolnet
ORG:European Schoolnet
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
          <contribute>
            <role>

              <value>enricher</value>

            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:Natt;Carlo;;;
FN:Carlo Natt
ORG:
END:VCARD</entity>
            <date>
              <dateTime>2007-10-08</dateTime>
            </date>
          </contribute>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>text</value>
          </learningResourceType>
          <intendedEndUserRole>

            <value>learner</value>
          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <context>
            <source>LRE.contextValues</source>
            <value>other</value>
          </context>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-t-lre">13-16</string>
            <string language="en">13-16</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Questo progetto può essere agevolmente adattato a diversi livelli scolastici.</string>
            <string language="en">This project can easily adapted to different levels.</string>
          </description>
        </educational>
        <rights>

          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc"><rdf:RDF xmlns="http://web.resource.org/cc/" xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/" xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#"><Work rdf:about=""><license rdf:resource="http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/2.5/" /></Work><License rdf:about="http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/2.5/"><requires rdf:resource="http://web.resource.org/cc/Attribution" /><permits rdf:resource="http://web.resource.org/cc/Reproduction" /><permits rdf:resource="http://web.resource.org/cc/Distribution" /><permits rdf:resource="http://web.resource.org/cc/DerivativeWorks" /><requires rdf:resource="http://web.resource.org/cc/Notice" /></License></rdf:RDF></string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <classification>
          <purpose>

            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
